Class SiteImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              SiteImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, SiteItf
public class SiteImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SiteItf

I am the implementation of the remote interface. I am both the RMI server and client. Code snippets: - instance creation: SiteImpl("//localhost/root", null); //create a root node SiteImpl("//localhost/son", "//localhost/root"); //create a son node. Its father is "//localhost/root/" - main messages: node.sendMessage("Hello World"); node.addFather("//localhost/root"); node.addSon(node1);

Author:
Benjamin Van Ryseghem, François Lepan
See Also:
